messages.title: BREXIT DEAL AGREED AND READY TO GO
messages.content: Protects jobs and trade. Ends uncertainty for our economy. Ready to go from day one of a new parliament.

messages.title: LAST TIME, THE CONSERVATIVES WERE JUST NINE SEATS SHORT OF A MAJORITY.
messages.content: A handful of seats will decide this election. So a handful of votes will be the difference between a majority government – and another hung parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: New Brexit deal agreed with EU that is ready to go from day one of a new parliament, which protects jobs and trade and ends uncertainty for our economy.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Every vote for Jeremy Corbyn makes another hung, talking parliament more likely.
mentions.partyLeader: Prime Minister Boris Johnson and the NHS

issues.brexitEurope: New Brexit deal agreed with EU, protects jobs and trade, ends uncertainty for our economy, ready to go from day one of a new parliament.
issues.health: PM on hospitals, police and schools, mentioned inside the leaflet.

quotes.text: CORBYN = FIVE LONG YEARS OF GRIDLOCK

images.caption: BREXIT DEAL AGREED AND READY TO GO

leaflet.additionalNotes: Voters in Pendle will decide this election.
